perturbation.original_text: TERM: The rights granted hereunder shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on December 31, 2006 (the "Term"); provided, however, that with respect to each Property, including Robots, Kingdom of Heaven, Mr. and Mrs. Smith, In Her Shoes, Idiocracy (Oww My Balls) and Ice Age II, all right and licenses granted herein will continue in full force and effect until March 31, 2008.
perturbation.changed_text: TERM: The rights granted hereunder shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on December 31, 2006 (the "Term"); provided, however, that with respect to each Property, including Robots, Kingdom of Heaven, Mr. and Mrs. Smith, In Her Shoes, Idiocracy (Oww My Balls) and Ice Age II, all right and licenses granted herein will continue in full force and effect until March 31, 2008. Notwithstanding the foregoing, for the properties Robots and Kingdom of Heaven, the term will automatically extend until December 31, 2008, regardless of any other provision in this section.
perturbation.explanation: The original agreement defines the term as expiring on a specific date, March 31, 2008, for specific properties. The modified version adds a contradictory statement specifying a different expiration date (December 31, 2008) for two specific properties (Robots and Kingdom of Heaven), creating ambiguity about the actual term length for those properties.

perturbation.original_text: NOTICE PROVISION: The notice information for Licensee in Section 17(a) of the Agreement shall be amended such that "Paul Zuzelo" is deleted and replaced with "General Counsel", and such that the email address for Paul Zuzelo is deleted.
perturbation.changed_text: NOTICE PROVISION: The notice information for Licensee in Section 17(a) of the Agreement shall be amended such that "Paul Zuzelo" is deleted and replaced with "General Counsel", and such that the email address for Paul Zuzelo is deleted. However, all notices related to financial matters should still be sent to Paul Zuzelo's previously listed email address.
perturbation.explanation: The initial amendment removes Paul Zuzelo as a point of contact. The conflicting addition states that financial notices should still be sent to his old email, creating confusion about who the official point of contact is and whether notices sent to the General Counsel regarding financial matters are sufficient.
